https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dnMolW2gF9WIkMPoqXOL1uCmCSB.jpg In an abandoned shopping center, Luis sees his best friend being assaulted. Incapable of facing it he runs away from the adolescent violence that haunts him while struggling against himself. Barehanded
